title: Fake survey answers from AI could quietly sway election predictions
description: Public opinion polls and other surveys rely on data to understand human behavior. New research from Dartmouth reveals that artificial intelligence can now corrupt public opinion surveys at scale—passing every quality check, mimicking real humans, and manipulating results without leaving a trace.

title: The US stock market is dropping as Nvidia and other AI superstars dim some more
description: The U.S. stock market is sinking as Nvidia and other superstars created by the frenzy around artificial-intelligence technology dim some more
content:
NEW YORK (AP) — The U.S. stock market is sinking on Monday as Nvidia and other superstars created by the frenzy around artificial-intelligence technology dim some more.

title: Teacher pleads guilty after being accused of using AI to make sexual videos of 8 students
description: A teacher pleaded guilty to possession of child pornography after being accused of using artificial intelligence to create sexual videos of students.
content:
CORINTH, Miss. (WMC/Gray News) - A teacher in Mississippi pleaded guilty to possession of child pornography after being accused of using artificial intelligence to create sexually exploitative videos of students.

title: AI To Create More Jobs Than It Eliminates By 2027: Report
description: Artificial intelligence is expected to transform the global workforce in the coming years as by 2027 AI will create more jobs than it eliminates, a new report said on Monday.
content:
Artificial intelligence is expected to transform the global workforce in the coming years as by 2027 AI will create more jobs than it eliminates, a new report said on Monday.

title: Maharashtra approves leopard sterilisation after 14 farmers killed in 2 months
description: The government has also decided to seek help from artificial intelligence (AI) to alert the villagers about the movements of the leopards, said minister Ganesh Ramachandra Naik.
content: Fourteen farmers in Maharashtra's Junnar, Nashik, Ahilyanagar, and Pune, died in the last two months. As the situation has taken a serious turn, the forest department officials, including the minister Ganesh Ramachandra Naik, held a meeting to protec... [1646 chars]

title: BofA says AI is boosting bankers' productivity, revenue
description: Bank of America plans to spend billions of dollars on technologies such as artificial intelligence to boost bankers' productivity and bring in more revenue, its chief technology and information officer said on Monday.
content:
BofA plans to allocate $4 billion into new technology capabilities from its $13 billion tech budget, the company told investors earlier this month. It plans to use AI more widely across all its businesses.
